definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great

pinyin: Da4 ying1 Lian2 he2 Wang2 guo2

definition: Kingdom Hall (place of worship used by Jehovah's Witnesses)
Koninkrijk der Nederlanden/Kingdom of the Netherlands

pinyin: Na4 bu4 le4 si1 wang2 guo2

sentences.english: It's one of the most haunting and complex sounds in the animal kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 這是動物王國中最爲複雜，最令人難以忘懷的音樂。

sentences.english: Wang Guowei is the founder of China's modern aesthetic.
sentences.chinese: 王國維是中國現代美學的奠基者。

sentences.english: For all its troubles, it seems that the US is still the real Middle Kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 儘管危機重重，美國似乎仍是真正的“中央王國”。

sentences.english: The kingdom was conquered by the Mongol and Chinese armies of Kublai Khan.
sentences.chinese: 大理王國後來被忽必烈率領的蒙漢聯軍擊敗。

sentences.english: Be known as " cork is regnal " Portuguese the cork that already had hundred years is produced history.
sentences.chinese: 被譽爲“軟木王國”的葡萄牙已有百年的軟木生產史。

sentences.english: The kingdom was conquered by the Mongol and Chinese armies of Kublai Khan .
sentences.chinese: 大理王國後來被忽必烈率領的蒙古族和漢族軍隊攻破。

sentences.english: This is Iceland, a land of fire and ice.
sentences.chinese: 這就是冰島，一個冰火交織的極致王國。

sentences.english: Beauty elim realized she was the only one to save the navy kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 美琳意識到她是唯一拯救海藍王國的人。

sentences.english: The kingdom of Norway is the land of fairies .
sentences.chinese: 挪威王國是土地的仙子。

sentences.english: America's auto titans are dismantling their global empires.
sentences.chinese: 美國汽車業巨頭的全球汽車王國正經歷着分崩離析。

sentences.english: These refer to the last days when the kingdom of God will be set up on earth.
sentences.chinese: 這些提及的最後幾天時，上帝的王國將成立地球上。

sentences.english: It was a pity that his sea power kingdom was not complete then he passed away.
sentences.chinese: 可惜他的海權王國並未完成，便與世長辭了。

sentences.english: Following Afghan tradition, local commanders are building independent fiefs that they will be reluctant to relinquish.
sentences.chinese: 按照阿富汗的傳統，當地的指揮官都願意自立王國。

sentences.english: Instinctual knowledge also instructs the insect kingdoms in their wherewithal.
sentences.chinese: 本能知識也引導昆蟲王國產生必要的行爲。

sentences.english: Her castle is in the south, in the country of the Quadlings.
sentences.chinese: 她的城堡在南方的誇德令王國。

sentences.english: In the animal kingdom, looks can be deceiving.
sentences.chinese: 在動物的王國裏，外表是能夠迷惑人的。

definition: legendary/fantasy saga/romance/short stories of the Tang and Song Dynasty
not just in name only, but also in reality (idiom)
to explore/to go on an expedition/adventure
